item.description:
"An entertaining, accessible and often inspirational mix of outstanding musical performances, informal interviews, skits and games, the show is a celebration of extraordinary musicians who happen to be teenagers leading fairly normal lives." - The Boston Globe

From the Top - NPR's showcase for young musicians, hosted by acclaimed concert pianist Christopher O'Riley - tapes a live recording in its hometown concert hall. Now celebrating its 10th anniversary on the air, From the Top's mix of serious music, light-hearted skits, and informal interviews spotlights the talent and passion of extraordinary young musicians ages 8-18, bringing new listeners to classical music and satisfying longtime followers. The program, which will be taped for national broadcast on NPR, will feature outstanding young artists from Boston and beyond.

We will be meeting at Betty's Wok and Noodle diner at 250 Huntington Ave for dinner at 6 pm.

Meetup is now FULL! (If anyone else still wants tix you can buy on the From the Top website or Bostix.org.)
item.name: From the Top - Live Taping
